field.label: *Publication Type
field.hint: Select the type of publication!
field.required: Select the type of publication.

field.label: *Author(s)
field.required: Enter the author(s) of your publication!

field.label: Editor
field.required: Enter the editor of your publication!

field.label: *Title
field.required: Enter the title of your publication!

field.label: *Conference Data
field.hint: Enter title, date and location of the conference, where your publication was presented, for example 11. Symposium ‚Tektonik — Strukturgeologie — Kristallingeologie‘ (TSK), 26.04.- 28.04.2000, Erlangen

field.label: *Title of Anthology
field.required: Enter the title of the anthology to which your publication belongs!

field.label: ID of Anthology
field.hint: ID (DOI, ISBN etc.) of the anthology to which your publication belongs!

field.label: *Issue Date
field.hint: Year in which the publication was first published
field.required: Enter the year in which your publication was first published (for digital reproductions enter the issue date of original)!

field.label: *Publisher
field.hint: If the document was published before, enter the publisher here.

field.label: Series
field.hint: If your document is part of a series, enter the title and number here (title;number)

field.label: Coordinates of Map
field.hint: Enter coordinates in the following way: W 074 50 - W 074 40 / N 045 05 - N 045 00

field.label: *Journal
field.hint: If your publication was published in a journal, enter the journal title here.

field.label: ISSN of Journal
field.hint: ISSN of journal in which your document was published.

field.label: *Extent in Pages
field.hint: Enter the extent in pages, for example: 55

field.label: ID of document
field.hint: If your document already has an identifier (DOI, ISBN etc.), enter it/them here.

field.label: Research Data URL
field.hint: If the research data to your publication is publicly available, enter the URL here.

field.label: *Language
field.required: Language in which your publication is written.

field.label: *Document Type
field.required: Select the appropriate type of your document.

field.label: *Document Version
field.required: Select the appropriate version of your document.

field.label: GOK category
field.hint: Select the appropriate category for your document.

field.label: Subject(s)
field.hint: Enter subjects for your document.

field.label: *Owner of Source
field.hint: Enter the owner of the source document (for example SUB Göttingen or "autorenaxemplar")
field.required: Enter the owner of the source of the digital reproduction!

field.label: Signature of Source
field.hint: Signature of source document. (for example POL III, 7311)

field.label: *Digitized By
field.required: Enter the institution that digitized the source document.

field.label: FID-Mark
field.hint: If the publication was digitized or first published for the FID GEO Project, enter FID-GEO-DE-7.

field.label: Is Version Of
field.hint: Enter URL of online-source, if one exists

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter abstracts in different languages in separate fields!

field.label: License
field.hint: If your Document already has a Creative Commons License, or you want to assign one, click on 'Select' and select one (Informations about CC Licenses: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/).

field.label: *Publikationstyp
field.hint: Wählen Sie bitte den Typ der Publikation aus!
field.required: Geben Sie bitte den Typ Ihrer Publikation an.

field.label: *Autor(en)
field.required: Geben Sie bitte die Autoren der Publikation an!

field.label: Herausgeber
field.required: Geben Sie bitte die Herausgeber der Publikation an!

field.label: *Titel der Publikation
field.required: Geben Sie bitte den Titel ihrer Publikation an!

field.label: *Erstveröffentlichung
field.hint: Jahr der Erstveröffentlichung
field.required: Bitte geben Sie das Jahr an, in dem Ihre Publikation (bei Digitalisaten die Druckvorlage) erstmals veröffentlicht wurde!

field.label: *Verlag
field.hint: Geben Sie hier bitte den Verlag an, in dem Ihre Publikation (bei Digitalisaten die Druckvorlage) erstmal erschienen ist.

field.label: Serie
field.hint: Geben Sie hier die Serie an, z.B. Geologische Spezialkarte von Preussen und den Thüringischen Staaten und Nachfolgewerke; Grad-Abtheilung 33 Blatt 22

field.label: Koordinaten der Karte
field.hint: Koordinaten bitte in folgender Form angeben: Westlichster Punkt der Karte - Östlichster Punkt der Karte / Nördlichster Punkt der Karte - Südlichster Punkt der Karte. Z.B. W 074 50 - W 074 40 / N 045 05 - N 045 00

field.label: *Umfang in Seiten
field.hint: Bitte nur die Zeitenazahl angaben. z.B. 36

field.label: ID des Dokumentes
field.hint: Falls Ihre Publikation bereits über einen ID (DOI, ISBN etc.) verfügt, geben Sie sie bitte an.

field.label: Forschungsdaten URL
field.hint: Sind die Forschungsdaten, auf die Ihre Publikation basiert, öffentlich zugänglich, so geben Sie hier bitte die Links (http://..) dazu ein.

field.label: *Sprache des Dokumentes
field.required: Bitte wählen Sie die Sprache aus, in der Ihre Publikation geschrieben ist.

field.label: *Dokumentart
field.required: Bitte wählen die Dokumentart aus, die auf Ihre Publikation zutrifft.

field.label: GOK-Kategorie
field.hint: Bitte klicken Sie auf GOK und wählen Sie die passende Kategorie aus.

field.label: Dewey Decimal Classification Number
field.hint: Bitte geben sie passende DDC Nummern an.

field.label: Schlagworte
field.hint: Bitte geben sie passende Schlagworte an.

field.label: *Besitzer der Vorlage des Digitalisates
field.hint: Bitte geben Sie hier den Besitzer des reproduzierten Exemplars an (z.B. "SUB Göttingen" oder "Autorenexemplar")
field.required: Bitte geben Sie den Besitzer des reproduzierten Exemplars an!

field.label: Signatur der Vorlage des Digitalisates
field.hint: Signatur des reproduzierten Exemplars, falls es einer Bibliothek gehört. (z.B.POL III, 7311)

field.label: *Reproduzierende Einrichtung des Digitalisates
field.required: Bitte geben Sie an, welche Einrichtung die Digitalisierung der Vorlage durchgeführt hat.

field.label: FID-Kennzeichen
field.hint: Im Rahmen des FID GEO-Projektes digitalisierte und veröffentlichte Dokumente aber auch über das Projekt eingestellte Erstveröffentlichungen bitte kennzeichnen.

field.label: Weitere Onlineausgabe
field.hint: Elektronische Adresse [http://] der Online-Vorlage, falls vorhanden.

field.label: Zusammenfassung
field.hint: Zusammenfassungen in verschiedenen Sprachen geben Sie bitte in getrennte Felder ein!

field.label: License
field.hint: If your Document already has a Creative Commons License, or you want to assign one, click on 'Select' and select one (Informations about CC Licenses: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/).

field.label: *Publication Type
field.hint: Select the type of your publication!
field.required: Select the type of your publication.

field.label: *Author(s)
field.required: Enter the author(s) of the publication!

field.label: Editor
field.required: Enter the editor of the publication!

field.label: *Title
field.required: Enter the title of the publication!

field.label: *Conference Data
field.hint: Enter the title, date and location of the conference, where your publication was presented, for example 11. Symposium ‚Tektonik — Strukturgeologie — Kristallingeologie‘ (TSK), 26.04.- 28.04.2000, Erlangen

field.label: *Title of Anthology
field.required: Enter the title of the anthology or conference proceedings to which your publication belongs!

field.label: ID of Anthology
field.hint: ID (DOI, ISBN etc.) of the anthology to which your publication belongs!

field.label: *Issue Date
field.hint: Year the publication was first published
field.required: Enter the year in which your publication was first published (for digital reproductions the issue date of the original)!

field.label: *Publisher
field.hint: Enter the publisher that first published your publication.

field.label: Is Part of Series
field.hint: If your document is part of a series, enter the series title and volume number here

field.label: Coordinates of Map
field.hint: Enter coordinates in the following way: W 074 50 - W 074 40 / N 045 05 - N 045 00

field.label: *Journal
field.hint: Enter the journal in which your article was published.

field.label: ISSN of Journal
field.hint: Enter the ISSN of the journal in which your article was published.

field.label: *Extent in pages
field.hint: Enter only the pages, for example: 56

field.label: ID of document
field.hint: If your publication already has an ID (DOI, ISBN etc.) enter it here.

field.label: Research Data URL
field.hint: If the research data to your publication is publicly available, enter the URL here.

field.label: *Language of document
field.required: Select the language in which your publication is written.

field.label: *Document Type
field.required: Select the document type for your publication.

field.label: *Document Version
field.required: Select the document version for your publication.

field.label: GOK category
field.hint: Select the GOK category for your publication.

field.label: Subject(s)
field.hint: Enter subjects for your publication.

field.label: *Owner of Source
field.hint: Enter the owner of the digitized object (for example SUB Göttingen or "autorenaxemplar")
field.required: Enter the owner of the digitized object!

field.label: Signature of Digitized Object
field.hint: Enter the signature of the digitized object if it belongs to a library (for example POL III, 7311)

field.label: *Digitized By
field.required: Enter the institution that digitized the object.

field.label: FID-Mark
field.hint: Select FID-GEO-DE-7 if the document was digitized or published in the context of the FID GEO project

field.label: Is Version Of
field.hint: URL of other online version of the publication if applicable.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter abstracts in different languages in separate fields!

field.label: License
field.hint: If your Document already has a Creative Commons License, or you want to assign one, click on 'Select' and select one (Informations about CC Licenses: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/).

field.hint: Signature of source document if it belongs to a library(for example POL III, 7311)

field.label: *Digitized By
field.required: Enter the institution that digitized the source document.

field.label: FID-Mark
field.hint: If the publication was digitized or first published for the FID GEO Project, enter FID-GEO-DE-7.

field.label: Other Online Versions
field.hint: Enter the URL of other online versions of the publication.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter abstracts in different languages in separate fields!

field.label: License
field.hint: If your Document already has a Creative Commons License, or you want to assign one, click on 'Select' and select one (Informations about CC Licenses: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/).

field.label: *Publication Type
field.hint: Select type of your publication!
field.required: Select type of your publication.

field.label: *Author(s)
field.required: Enter the author(s) of your publication!

field.label: Editor(s)
field.required: Enter the editor(s) of your publication !

field.label: *Title
field.required: Enter the title of your publication!

field.label: *Conference Data
field.hint: Enter title, date and location of the conference where your publiction was presented, for example: 11. Symposium ‚Tektonik — Strukturgeologie — Kristallingeologie‘ (TSK), 26.04.- 28.04.2000, Erlangen

field.label: *Title of Anthology
field.required: Enter the title of the anthology in which your publication was published!

field.label: ID of Anthology
field.hint: ID (DOI, ISBN etc.) of anthology in which your publication was published!

field.label: *Issue Date
field.hint: Year of first publication
field.required: Enter the year in which your publication was first published (for digital reproductions the issue date of the original)!

field.label: *Publisher
field.hint: Enter the publisher where your publication was first published.

field.label: *Series/Volume
field.hint: Enter series and volume number in following form: Freiberg Online Geosciences; Vol. 01.1998
field.required: Enter series and volume number!

field.label: Coordinates of Map
field.hint: Enter coordinates of the map in the following way: W 074 50 - W 074 40 / N 045 05 - N 045 00

field.label: *Journal
field.hint: Enter the title of the journal in which your publication was published.

field.label: ISSN of Journal
field.hint: ISSN of journal in which your publication was published.

field.label: *Extent
field.hint: Enter the extent in page numbers, for example: 36

field.label: ID of Document
field.hint: If your publication already has an ID (DOI, ISBN etc.), enter it here.

field.label: Research Data URL
field.hint: If the research data on which your publication is based is publicly available, enter the URL here.

field.label: *Language
field.required: Select the language in which your document is written.

field.label: *Document Type
field.required: Select the document type for your publication.

field.label: *Document Version
field.required: Select the document version for your publication.

field.label: GOK category
field.hint: Select the GOK category for your publication.

field.label: Subject(s)
field.hint: Enter subjects for your publication.

field.hint: Enter the owner of the source document (for example SUB Göttingen or "author exemplar")
